alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 28 at 3:14AM PST until December 30 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible with total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From early Wednesday morning through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and dangerous travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another round of heavy snow possible mainly above 7000 feet Wednesday and Thursday, favoring southern portions of the eastern Sierra Slopes and White Mountains.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County
